ModMetaData.name: Food Bowl
ModMetaData.author: Programmer Lily
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a Food Bowl - a single-stack storage building specifically designed for pet foods and animal feed. Perfect for organizing your colony's animal care station!
Features: - Single-stack storage (holds one stack per bowl) - Prevents food deterioration - Optimized for animal foods: Hay, Kibble, Milk, InsectJelly, Pemmican, Raw Berries, Raw Fungus, Raw Agave - Automatically excludes all human meals (Simple, Fine, Lavish, Survival Packs, Nutrient Paste) - Hidden storage (food is stored but not visually displayed in the bowl) - Cheap to build (only 8 materials vs 20+ for shelf) - Compact 1x1 footprint with low beauty impact - Multiple material options (Metallic, Woody, Stony) - Found in Furniture category - No research required - Compatible with RimWorld 1.6
Perfect for pet feeding stations, animal farms, ranches, and keeping your animal feed organized and fresh!
